name: Greek Newspapers
author: Giorgos Iliopoulos

sections.description:
A wordpress plugin to fetch daily greek newspapers.

Important message for users:

Please note that the images displayed using our plugin are fetched from the third-party website https://www.news247.gr/ and are subject to the website’s terms of service and any applicable agreements. We do not claim ownership of these images and have no affiliation with the website.
